issue.title: [CF 952] Range Check - LibRangeCheck-2.0
issue.body:
Hello,

Is it possible either through your own library or via LibRangeCheck-2.0 to implement a range condition check?

Things like for a Priest if Halo, Cascade, etc i can then set a condition for if the range to target is greater than xx but less than xx.

I was writing this as a little addon for myself just to use as a LUA condition but i thought others might find it useful if it fits within the scope of TellMeWhen.

http://www.wowace.com/addons/librangecheck-2-0/pages/api/


> Posted by CurseForge user Torchler | Imported from CurseForge issue #952 | Raw

comments.body:
Done in g64bc7a7

Edited Jun 14, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
